issue.title: [FlightRPC][Java] Add support for HTTP cookies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10428](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10428). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add support for HTTP cookies to the Java FlightClient.

Create a middleware that reads Set-Cookie and Set-Cookie2 headers from server responses and puts corresponding Cookie headers on requests.

Respect expiration/max-age attributes of cookies.
